::Aerotaur::
    He opens a com to Windlord.  "We need the back up NOW.  They're here, and 
we're out numbered.  Anyone that can come will help us.  But for some reason 
they're ignoring me...  Finish the negotiations after the attack."  He closes 
the com and glances around.  He sees Blender aiming at Nightlight.  
"NIGHTLIGHT LOOK OUT!"  He's too far away to get there this time.  He glances 
around again until he finds Deemos.  "DEEMOS!  YOU'RE MINE!"  He flies at him 
leading with his bladed staff.
